Release LTS.466.13 of September 17, 2025
New features
For
On-Premise
and
Private Cloud
solutions, it is now possible to install a new application version directly from the "Platform updates" modal window by clicking the
button in the navigation panel.
When switching to the compact view of the
main menu
, the company logo will change to the favicon, and if absent, will be adapted to its size.
It is now possible to change the
parent type
if there are no objects of the customized object type and no links with other objects.
When working with the
subject area
, it is now possible to delete association relations between System objects.
In addition, a
button appeared for quick access to the object registry of the selected type.
The
escapeJsonMbcs
and
unescapeJsonMbcs
functions were implemented for escaping string characters into JSON format and extracting text from a JSON-formatted string, respectively.
The
renameLdapEntry
function was implemented to rename the existing entry in the Microsoft Active Directory directory service.
The function to run an algorithm by object and the setting for recalculation of expression/auto-calculation for all type instances can now be added to an
update
.
Access control for the
webhook plugin of external chats
is now managed via the corresponding
permission
.
The ability to
authenticate using the AppRole
method when storing secret variables in Vault was implemented.
The method of receiving updates from the Telegram server for chatbot operation can now be configured via the
configuration file parameter
.
The
userInfoUrl
parameter in the OAuth2 setup is now optional: if it is not specified, the custom data from the accessToken will be used.
As part of the new terminology introduction, the concept of "Printed Form" was replaced with "Document Template".
When working with a document generated from a template, it is now possible to switch between edits without accepting or rejecting them.
Changes and improvements
The generation of the
substitution
notification sent by email was adjusted in accordance with the employee’s locale.
When creating an
auto-calculation
, both its own attributes and attributes of the
parent object type
are now available in the "Attribute with object list" parameter.
For an object attribute with the
"Multiple objects as a table"
visual, the tooltip text "Remove from the list of attribute values" is now fixed for the
button, regardless of the
button settings in the registry
.
Saving an object was restored when the configured
restriction
conditions are violated.
When deleting an object from the
subject-area
using the
Del
key, it is now possible to choose the deletion method.
An automatic generation of field names for tables when creating an associative relation between types in the
subject-area
was debugged.
In the modal window of
attribute settings
for the "String" and "Text" types, the parameter responsible for defining the maximum value length was renamed to "Character count".
Data filtering in the child attribute registry was adjusted.
For attributes of "Date" type with the
"Calendar change with hierarchy, with type dynamics restriction by another object"
visual, the filter operation in the registry was adjusted.
Instance filtering in the registry using an SQL-based filter was stabilized.
The operation of search filters in the registry was debugged.
The opening of the registry with configured filtering was stabilized.
For a nested group of attributes, the color scheme configuration was adjusted.
The tooltip display was corrected when
changing the user password
.
The grammatical forms in the
multiselect attributes
values were corrected.
The inheritance of visuals from the
parent object type
to child types was adjusted.
For the
"Attribute Group"
visual grouping element, label text longer than 3 characters is automatically shortened.
The display of the registry embedded using a
frame
was debugged.
The operation of the
user input saving
option was stabilized when closing an unsaved object.
For the
"Quick Access Toolbar"
widget, a placeholder was added that will be displayed when no search results are found.
The proportion saving of the
"Horizontal Registry"
widget was adjusted depending on the number of displayed objects and the width of the container.
In the
"Text Message"
widget, working with hyperlinks was adjusted.
The naming algorithm in the
"Tabs Management"
widget was adjusted.
The color determination algorithm for the
"Voting Status and Results"
widget was stabilized.
Access permissions required for configuring the
"Rating"
widget were added to the default package.
When working with the
"Financial statements"
widget, the report generation process was stabilized, taking into account the reporting form’s dynamic type.
For
SQL-based data sources
, support for Cyrillic in column aliases was added.
To improve compactness of display, the
action
names were changed:
Suspend regulatory term → Suspend;
Resume regulatory term → Resume.
The operation of the
custom action
for invoking an algorithm with saving of the current object was debugged.
The algorithm launch using the
schedule
was stabilized.
The batch action for attaching/detaching files to a "File" type attribute was debugged.
The operation of the
redefined action for the "OK" button
was stabilized.
The operation of the
itab
function was adjusted.
The selection of individual symbols/functions/strings of algorithms and deletion of selected elements using the
Del
and
Backspace
keys were stabilized.
The warning about entering Cyrillic letters similar to Latin ones was disabled.
Now, when calling the
setTaskExecutor
and
writeWfLog
functions, dummy variables will be added to the algorithm code to simplify working with parameters.
Copying of compiled algorithm code generated on the "Tech. Information" tab was adjusted.
Parsing of algorithms with an unclosed parenthesis was stabilized.
The error message for an empty "user" parameter in the
userHasGroup
function was corrected.
In the algorithm editor, navigation between
attributes
using the arrow keys was debugged.
The operation of the
secretVariable
function was stabilized.
The behavior of the
condition tree
when working with object attribute values was fixed.
Logging of errors of asynchronously launched ETL processes was added.
The launch of the ETL process using the algorithm was debugged.
The system behavior when
terminating one of the user’s sessions
was improved.
The ability to customize the frequency of audit normalization was added.
Audit saving was accelerated.
A number of security improvements was implemented in the System.
The connection parameters to speech recognition services are now specified in the
application configuration file
.
In the
configuration file
, the parameter for managing
user
data synchronization with an external provider during
domain authentication via LDAP
was repositioned.
The process of locking/unlocking users based on data received from Microsoft Active Directory was adjusted.
Switching between tabs in a document was stabilized when the system setting
"Display change indication in the object"
is active.
The ability to preview files containing comments and/or corrections added in a third-party program was adjusted.
Collaborative work with a document generated from a template was stabilized when adding a section break.
Working with a document when adding/removing images in table cells was adjusted.
The hotkeys
Ctrl+F
for text search in a document was enabled.
The acceptance of edits made by other user when deleting text with a comment was adjusted.
Editing of headers and footers in an EDoc document was adjusted.
